column4: PuMpErNickle: Thanks. I have a P2 with 450mhz, 512mb memory, and 13Gb hdd.
I just ordered the disks. I have a linux system on it now, but as a newbie to linux, it's a litte difficult to get the thing working right.
Thanks, all. What irc program is bundled with ubuntu? I'm using mIRC on this machine and kopete on the linux machine.
